Text: Preview off EverythingSALE PREVIEW off Everything online Youre the first to know Because youre one of our select email shoppers were sending you this advance notice of our off everything sale Shop online now and save on more than fashion accessory and home accent items before we announce the sale to everyone else on October th Jump online for best selection Sale ends October th Click the link below Coldwater Creek Your kind of clothes Online All the time wwwcoldwatercreekcom Offer Details To receive your online savings click or enter WHA in the Offer Code field below your credit card information during Checkout Discount is automatically tallied during Checkout from the lowest price displayed on the Web site Discount applies to merchandise total only and does not include shipping and handling off cannot be combined with other offers and does not apply on The Gallery at Coldwater Creek Offer good through midnight EST October This email was sent to HESPIRESCOM If you would rather not receive future emails from Coldwater Creek please reply to this message and type remove in the subject line We will remove your name from our email list Call tollfree to speak with a customer service representative
